text: Bigu: «Ej ahli kitoʙ, sumo ʙar cize nested, (ja'ne ʙa Qur'on, Muhammad, pajomʙari xud va kitoʙaton imon naovardaed) to on goh, ki Tavrot va Incil va on ciro az coniʙi Parvardigoraton ʙar sumo nozil sudaast, ʙarpoj dored». On ci az coniʙi Parvardigorat ʙar tu nozil sudaast, ʙar tuƣjon va kufri ʙestarason ʙijafzojad. Pas ʙar in mardumi kofir ƣamgin maʙos
